description.p: Gemborn are beings of pure crystal, possessing unique abilities and a deep connection to magic. They are a race of both beauty and power, their very existence a testament to the extraordinary forces that shape the world.
Gemborn have an innate connection to magic, sensing the subtle vibrations of the world around them. They are often viewed with curiosity, awe, or fear by other races.
Gemborn have advantage on Constitution saving throws against being poisoned or petrified.
Gemborn have advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks related to understanding the nature of magic, identifying magical items, or deciphering magical symbols.
Gemborn have an AC of 10 + their Dexterity modifier + their Constitution modifier.
Instead of sleeping, Gemborn ground themselves by burying their feet in the earth. This process takes 2 hours for a short rest and 4 hours for a long rest.
A sharp fragment of crystal that can be used as a makeshift weapon or tool.
A small pouch containing powdered crystal that can be used for various purposes, such as creating a blinding flash or repairing minor damage to their crystalline form.
Amethyst Gemborn possess a deep purple hue, shimmering with an inner light. They have a keen mind and a mastery of magic.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 2 and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Psychic Sensitivity. Advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks and saves against charm/frighten.
Dream Weaver. 1/long rest, trance for vision of future or distant location.
Phasewalk. 1/long rest, ethereal state, immune to nonmagical weapons for 1 round.
Mind Shield. Advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened once per short or long rest.
Arcane Intuition. Advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks to recall magic info.
Diamond Gemborn are clad in crystalline armor, exuding an aura of authority and command.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2 and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Adamantine Resilience. Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.
Inner Light. 1/long rest, emit bright light in a 15-foot radius for 1 minute, granting allies advantage on sight-based Perception checks.
Flawless Focus. Advantage on Concentration saving throws.
Diamond Aura. As a reaction when hit, force the attacker to make a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 force damage.
Shattering Strike. Once per short or long rest, deal an extra 1d6 force damage with a melee weapon attack.
Emerald Gemborn embody the life force of nature, with skin the color of fresh spring leaves.
Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increases by 2 and your Constitution score increases by 1.
Nature's Whisperer. Can cast "Speak with Plants" and "Druidcraft" each 1/long rest without using a spell slot.
Emerald Touch. Expend a hit die to heal a creature for a number of hit points equal to the number rolled on the die.
Forest Affinity. Advantage on saves against poison and resistance to poison damage.
Renewing Touch. Expend a hit die to heal a plant or accelerate its growth.
One With Nature. Can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by natural phenomena.
Sapphire Gemborn have skin that shimmers with the deep hues of the ocean, reflecting their calm demeanor.
Ability Score Increase. Your Intelligence score increases by 1 and your Charisma score increases by 2.
Ocean's Embrace. Can hold breath twice as long and has a swimming speed of 30 feet.
Voice of Calm. Expend a hit die to cast "Calm Emotions."
Telepathic Communication. Can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet.
Serene Mind. Advantage on saves against being charmed or frightened.
Flowing Motion. Can move through the space of larger creatures.
Ruby Gemborn have a fiery spirit, their skin reflecting the fiery depths of a molten core.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 1 and your Constitution score increases by 2.
Burning Heart. Resistance to fire damage.
Ruby Flare. Expend a hit die to cast "Burning Hands."
Imposing Presence. Advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks.
Relentless Endurance. Can drop to 1 hit point instead of 0 once per long rest.
Rage. The Ruby Gemborn can enter a rage as a bonus action. The rage lasts for 1 minute and ends early if the Gemborn is knocked unconscious or stabilized.
Rose Quartz Gemborn radiate warmth and compassion, their skin glowing with a soft light.
Ability Score Increase. Your Charisma score increases by 2 and your Wisdom score increases by 1.
Empathic Sense. Advantage on Persuasion and Insight checks to discern emotions.
Soothing Presence. Expend a hit die to cast "Sanctuary."
Aura of Tranquility. Advantage on saves against charm/frighten, and nearby allies gain the same advantage.
Healing Hands. Gain the Healing Hands feat.
Beacon of Hope. Expend a hit die to grant temporary hit points to themselves and each creature within 5 feet equal to the number rolled on the die.
